definition: a section of something that is long and narrow
details:
noun
- a section of something that is long and narrow
= example: a section of something that is long and narrow
- continuance in time
= synonyms: duration
- the linear extent in space from one end to the other
= example: the linear extent in space from one end to the other
- size of the gap between two places
= synonyms: distance
- the property of being the extent of something from beginning to end
= example: the property of being the extent of something from beginning to end
